translations: Alo, entsprechend dem Unrecht, das er an den Armen verübt hatte, bis er verkohlte und an Ort und Stelle starb

Preterit Intransitive.turoyo: Qṭile, be áydarbo qṭile, Xandaq xamido
translations: ‘He killed him, at the moment he killed him, Xandeq collapsed/crumbled into dust’ (NE_Boses and Shushan). Ilyas says that this verb is used typically to talk about thr fire, so here he imagines that something similar happened. He also approved yığılma as a possible turkish translation(13/05/24 Ilyas p.c.)
